text: Frederick Theodore Badcock better known as Ted Badcock was born 9 August, 1897 in Abbottabad, Pakistan and died 19 September, 1982 in South Perth, Australia. He was a New Zealand cricketer who played seven tests for New Zealand from 1929/30 to 1932/33 and was the best-allrounder. He is first players capped in test cricket for New Zealand. ==Other webites== * * Obituary, Wisden, 1984 Category:1897 births Category:1982 deaths Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:Abbottabad
title: Ted Badcock
